name: GENTLE
description:
💀💀💀💀💀💀

You wanted to help people.
You wanted to see the world.
You could really use the money.
You didn't mean to make a mistake.
But now you're all in this together. 

Who's in charge?

GENTLE is a retro-styled atmospheric horror game developed for the 2022 IGMC Rebirth Game Jam. The game is currently in development and a build of the game will be available for the jam for a short period of time. Then I'm gonna finish it. :)

💀💀💀💀💀💀

  • Developed in RPG Maker 2003 by Riggy2k3 (Deluge)
  • Additional programming by Giznads (Nihilo)
  • Featuring music by bennymakesgames (RPG Maker Cola)
  • Atmospheric sounds by 1AMTRAIN (Horror Sounds Vol. 2)
  • Chipsets by finalbossblues (Time Fantasy)
  • Bugtesting by DZpg1, mario_prospero, hot_gamer_dad, Frogge and TheRPGMakerAddict (thank you!)

💀💀💀💀💀💀

Controls:

Action: [Z], [ENTER], [SPACE]
Menu/Exit: [X], [ESC]
Run: [SHIFT]
Movement: ARROW KEYS [F4] - Resize Window
[F5] - Window/audio settings

[F12] - Restart game/to title

💀💀💀💀💀💀

Thank you for playing! Stay tuned for updates! :)
(Current version: v0.09)
